org.chabala.brick.controllab

Class ControlLabIT

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.chabala.brick.controllab.ControlLabIT

  • public class ControlLabIT
extends Object
    Integration tests for the ControlLab.

    These tests require a connection to the hardware. There's no way to validate the behavior other than observing the control lab, so there are no assertions.

      • testMotorInBothDirections

        public void testMotorInBothDirections()
                               throws Exception
        This test starts all outputs at the highest power level, gradually decreases to the minimum power level, then changes the direction and increases back to maximum. This continues until a touch sensor on Input 1 is pressed. It can be used to test an output device to see how it behaves under different power supply levels.
        Throws:
        Exception - on any issue with the test
